name: PL-11: Unchained
description:
Welcome to PL-11, the sequel to the PL-10 demo.

In this game, you wander around in a ancient lab as aliens took over the world. Strange poles confines you in a space and your gun can't get you out of these, only one solution : use enemies projectiles to break the chains.

Controls:

WASD - arrow keys : Move

Left click : shoot

Space : Invincible dash

Credits:
